resources.string: We are living in the society where Humans are only animal but have you ever thought about animal that are living with animals.
Helper is someone who looked at animal who is not well all wants to help that animal. He/She only needs to click photo and share with location.
These are the group of people who work for the welfare of the animal Helper captured photo can be seen by only these members.
if you found any animal like me please help him too.
You can share the realtime location of that animal at the time of clicking photo
